sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Too close to call, Turkey's presidential election looks set to go to a second round runoff with neither candidate netting more than half the votes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As Ukraine's President Vladimir Zelensky visits key European allies, France promises key more light tanks and armored vehicles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thailand's reformist Move Forward Party narrowly wins the general election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: With more than 14 million votes, it has vowed to form a six-party coalition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In Bangladesh hundreds of thousands of people have begun returning to homes they'd evacuated as Cyclone Mokka battered the country's coast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, who has ruled his country with an increasingly

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: firm grip for 20 years, is locked in a tight election race.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It looks like he's headed for a make-or-break runoff against his chief challenger in two weeks, as neither candidate appears to have achieved the 50 percent threshold. Turkey's Supreme Election Council says Kilic de Rolü is on 44.79 percent just behind Erdogan on 49.49 percent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Erdogan's rival has called for an end to the uncertainty and says he's confident he can win the second round.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The election comes against the background of soaring inflation and in the aftermath of intense criticism of the government's response to Turkey's devastating earthquakes in February. 64 million people were eligible to vote.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky arriving in Paris late on Sunday, where he was met by France's prime minister and foreign minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: His visit is part of a world-wing tour of Europe to shore up support from Kyiv's allies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: During some three hours of talks with the French president, Emmanuel Macron promised to train and equip several Ukrainian battalions and provide them with dozens of armoured vehicles and light tanks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Earlier, Zelensky was in Berlin, where he thanked German Chancellor Olaf Scholz for his government's new military package worth 2.7 billion euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces are preparing for a spring counteroffensive to reclaim territory captured by Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Thailand, reformist opposition leader Pita Laiter-Onra says he is willing to become Prime Minister, after a surprise election result gave his Progressive Move Forward party a majority in Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The 42-year-old said he will form a six-party coalition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: People of Thailand have already spoken their wish and I am ready to be the prime minister for all, whether you agree with me or you disagree with me.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: I have congratulated Khun Phan Thong Thanh from Phua Thai for her hard-fought campaign and have invited her to join the coalition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: And that includes five more parties in the previous opposition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Light Iran-Raz victory signals a major swing towards democratic reform and the rejection of military-backed parties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Nine years ago, outgoing Prime Minister General Prayuth Chanaka led a military coup which ousted the elected government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A fragile ceasefire between Israel and militants in Gaza appears to be holding. ousted the elected government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A fragile ceasefire between Israel and militants in Gaza appears to be holding, but the damage wrought by Israeli air raids on the Palestinian stronghold is extensive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The latest round of Gaza fighting was sparked Tuesday when Israeli jets killed three top commanders from the Islamic Jihad militant group in response to earlier rocket launches from Gaza. قتلت ثلاثة مديري أعلى من الجيهد الإسلامي في مجال التنقل الأكثر من قبل منتجات الركض من غازا كانت المواطنين في المنطقة تنظر إلى مباقي عائلتهم تنقل إلى مجالات المرحلة لتجميع ما يمكن أن يتم تجميعه لا حياة مستقرة ولا أمان ولا شيء ما الذي نفعله لهم؟ لا شيء الناس غلابة في حالها يريدون أن يستهدفوا عجل البيت لماذا لا يكون الحياة مستقرة؟ which has affected Palestinians with work permits or permission to access essential medical treatment not available in the impoverished territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The move is also allowed in fuel trucks which now supply Gaza's power station.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in southern Israel, nervous residents in Ashkelon relaxed on the beach.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last week's volley of rockets from Gaza has sent locals diving into shelters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Most of the rockets were intercepted by Israel's defence system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Both sides have committed to the ceasefire, but both have warned they will resume fire if provoked.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And that's put the survival of this million-year-old landscape in question, in particular for the thousands of co-inhabitating species. I can put them in two groups of factors, and they are serious factors.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is the anthropogenic influence, that is, the activity of man within the borders of the lake and the lake area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The dramatic decrease in the water level of the lake has put its rich biodiversity in serious danger, in particular the region's endemic bird species.

Οι αγώνα που η νεοναζική γκρουπ, υποδηλώδη για πολλές χρόνια, ήταν τίποτα μόνο από μια κριμινό γκρουπ που εργάζεται υπό την κομμάτια μιας πολιτικής κοινωνικής.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Βρισκόμαστε στο σημείο που πριν από σχεδόν 10 χρόνια, τα διαβόητα τάγματα εφόδου της Χρυσής Αυγής, που την εποχή εκείνη τρομοκρατούσαν τις λαϊκές συνοικίες του Πειραιά, δολοφονούσαν τον ράπερ και ακτιβιστή Παύλο Φίσα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Όπως αποδείχτηκε, ήταν η αρχή του τέλους για το νεοναζιστικό μόρφωμα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Ένα τέλος που επισφραγίστηκε με την εκλογική αποτυχία του 2019 αλλά και την καταδικαστική απόφαση του εφετίου Αθηνών λίγους μήνες αργότερα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Αν και οι εποχές έχουν αλλάξει, τα κηρύγματα μίσους της Χρυσής Αυγής που διαμορφώθηκαν κυρίως την εποχή των μνημονίων αλλά και στο απόγειο της μεταναστευτικής κρίσης δυσκολεύοντας την καθημερινότητα του καθενός, και μεταδίδι.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Κάποιοι μέλη του Golden Dawn δεν έχουν ακόμα δώσει τους πολιτικούς αμπισίδες, όπως ο Ηλίος Κασιδιάρης, που ήταν κυβερνητής μετά την εκκλησία του για να δημιουργήσει μια κριμινική εξετάσταση.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Έκανε μια μεγάλη προεκλογική εκστρατεία από τη φυλακή και εδώ υπάρχουν πολύ μεγάλες ευθύνες, γιατί του επιτράπηκε να επικοινωνεί, να χρησιμοποιεί λογαριασμού στα social media, να κάνει ομιλίες μέσα από το κελί του.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Θέλει να είναι μια επόμενη ημέρα για την ακροδεξιά.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Πρέπει να πούμε ότι είναι εξαιρετικά σημαντικό το γεγονός ότι έστω και με παλινοδίες και καθυστερήσεις τελικά βρέθηκε ένας τρόπος θεσμικά λογικός για να μην πάρει μέρος στις εκλογές.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Το θέμα είναι ότι το ζήτημα της ακροδεξιάς στην Ελλάδα όχι μόνο δεν έχει κλείσει, τώρα περνάει σε μια άλλη, πολύ πιο δύσκολη φάση.
